condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var key;
key=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION WHERE ID =? CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID START WITH ID = 13831",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
key>0

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var xmid =O_WORKFLOW.XMMC;
var result=null;
var bean = ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.papers.LinkstecBean");
result = bean.execute(1007, $Login.User.UserID,2,xmid);
var note=result.get('note');
var code=result.get('code');
true;

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(userid)) from lbmember where orgid=? and roleid=6\",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM])","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"'-终止项目流程已提交部门负责人审批'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where  id = 13929 start with id = ?  connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
cnt1 == 1

step.name: 投资银行总部总经理审批

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(userid)),',',';') from lbmember where orgid=13836 and roleid=4\")","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'项目终止流程已提交质控部负责人审批'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["UPDATE ECIF.TIB_XMXX SET SFRZZK=1,RZZKSJ = TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) WHERE ID ={0} ",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.XMMC","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"}]]

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select id from jgcrm.tuser where id = 1279\")","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-项目终止审批流程已审批完成'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

step.name: 项目组答复质控审批意见

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where  id = 13929 start with id = ?  connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
cnt1 == 1

function.name: abs.ExecSQL

step.name: 保荐业务部门负责人审批
投资银行总部总经理审批
保荐业务部门负责人审批

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var cnt1=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and KPJD=111 and  GPLX = 3 ",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt2=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and KPJD=112 and  SFWCXC = 3 and SFCYBJDDQJ = 1",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt3=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and  KPJD in (113,114)  and SFWCXC = 3",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
cnt==1&&(cnt1==1||cnt2==1||cnt3==1)

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var cnt1=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and KPJD=111 and  GPLX = 3 ",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt2=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and KPJD=112 and  SFWCXC = 3 and SFCYBJDDQJ = 1",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt3=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and  KPJD in (113,114)  and SFWCXC = 3",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
cnt==1&&cnt1==0&&cnt2==0&&cnt3==0

var cnt3=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and  KPJD in (113,114)  and SFWCXC = 3",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
